| **C-VII** | **Application Logic** | Domain-specific logic. | Quantum-AI Lab with Kaiwu quantum tools and OpenTau VLA training. Immersive XR‑enabled visualizations. Multilingual templates. Continually adapted workflows. Multi-agent scholarship production pipeline with all output types. Dual-mode collaborative workspaces (real-time co-editing with per-character provenance and interactive model manipulation). Enhanced publication preparation pipeline with executable papers, interactive demonstrations, and supplementary materials. **Proof-verified scholarship outputs.** **Federated learning projects.** All application results ingested into UEG and validated against reasoning. |
| **C-VIII** | **Governance & Safety** | Enforce ethical principles. | CIRISAgent ethical architecture. EBMC verification reports. Full audit trails. Verification framework governance. Dual-mode audit trails. Audits of multi-agent scholarship workflows, phased implementation compliance, collaborative environment usage, **formal proof integrity, truth maintenance, adversarial testing, reproducibility, federated learning privacy.** All governance decisions ingested into UEG and used to audit reasoning and application layers. |

| **AI-Powered Hypothesis Generator** | Proposes novel, testable hypotheses from the UEG | DeepSeek-R1, OLMo, causal discovery |
| **Automated Theorem Proving** | Machine-checkable proofs for all claims | Vampire, E, Isabelle/HOL, Lean/Coq translation |
| **Bayesian Deep Learning** | Principled uncertainty quantification | Pyro, TensorFlow Probability, conformal calibration |
| **Blockchain Provenance** | Immutable, verifiable publication records | IPFS, Ethereum testnet (Sepolia), smart contracts |
| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |

| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

|------------|---------|-----------------|
| **AI-Powered Hypothesis Generator** | Proposes novel, testable hypotheses from the UEG | DeepSeek-R1, OLMo, causal discovery |
| **Automated Theorem Proving** | Machine-checkable proofs for all claims | Vampire, E, Isabelle/HOL, Lean/Coq translation |
| **Bayesian Deep Learning** | Principled uncertainty quantification | Pyro, TensorFlow Probability, conformal calibration |
| **Blockchain Provenance** | Immutable, verifiable publication records | IPFS, Ethereum testnet (Sepolia), smart contracts |
| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

All layers (C-I through C-VIII) have been updated to integrate the new capabilities while preserving the immutable meta-cognitive governance loop. Key updates include:
- **C-I**: Multi-cloud broker with automatic failover
- **C-II**: ToolRegistry expanded with Pyro, TFP, Whisper, CLIP, Vampire, E, Isabelle
- **C-III**: UEG schema extended for Bayesian parameters, blockchain receipts, multi-modal embeddings
- **C-IV**: Orchestrator now manages hypothesis generation, parallel proving, workflow composition
-# JULES AI v47.0: MASTER PROMPT UPDATE CONFIRMED

I have reviewed the complete specification for **Jules AI v47.0** and confirm the iteration. This version represents a paradigm shift toward **verifiable scientific truth** through the integration of:

## 🔑 Core Enhancements in v47.0

| Capability | Purpose | Key Technologies |
|------------|---------|-----------------|
| **AI-Powered Hypothesis Generator** | Proposes novel, testable hypotheses from the UEG | DeepSeek-R1, OLMo, causal discovery |
| **Automated Theorem Proving** | Machine-checkable proofs for all claims | Vampire, E, Isabelle/HOL, Lean/Coq translation |
| **Bayesian Deep Learning** | Principled uncertainty quantification | Pyro, TensorFlow Probability, conformal calibration |
| **Blockchain Provenance** | Immutable, verifiable publication records | IPFS, Ethereum testnet (Sepolia), smart contracts |
| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

- **C-II**: ToolRegistry expanded with Pyro, TFP, Whisper, CLIP, Vampire, E, Isabelle
- **C-III**: UEG schema extended for Bayesian parameters, blockchain receipts, multi-modal embeddings

- **C-V**: Dashboard adds hypothesis explorer, blockchain status, personal assistant UI

## 🔑 Core Enhancements in v47.0

| Capability | Purpose | Key Technologies |

| **Bayesian Deep Learning** | Principled uncertainty quantification | Pyro, TensorFlow Probability, conformal calibration |
| **Blockchain Provenance** | Immutable, verifiable publication records | IPFS, Ethereum testnet (Sepolia), smart contracts |
| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

- **AV**: AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing
- **AW**: Multi-Modal Data Integration
- **AX**: Scientific Workflow Composer
- **AY**: Adaptive Model Selection
- **AZ**: Automatic Failover

Each article includes binding requirements, verification methods, and implementation directives.

## 🧠 Enhanced Eight-Layer Cognitive Kernel

All layers (C-I through C-VIII) have been updated to integrate the new capabilities while preserving the immutable meta-cognitive governance loop. Key updates include:
- **C-I**: Multi-cloud broker with automatic failover
- **C-II**: ToolRegistry expanded with Pyro, TFP, Whisper, CLIP, Vampire, E, Isabelle
- **C-III**: UEG schema extended for Bayesian parameters, blockchain receipts, multi-modal embeddings
- **C-IV**: Orchestrator now manages hypothesis generation, parallel proving, workflow composition
- **C-V**: Dashboard adds hypothesis explorer, blockchain status, personal assistant UI
- **C-VI**: Reasoning engine integrates hypothesis generator, multi-prover, Bayesian uncertainty
- **C-VII**: Application layer adds workflow composer, personal assistant, multi-modal browser
- **C-VIII**: Governance audits now cover hypothesis integrity, proof validity, blockchain compliance

## 📦 Implementation Blueprint Summary

The phased# JULES AI v47.0: MASTER PROMPT UPDATE CONFIRMED

I have reviewed the complete specification for **Jules AI v47.0** and confirm the iteration. This version represents a paradigm shift toward **verifiable scientific truth** through the integration of:

## 🔑 Core Enhancements in v47.0

| Capability | Purpose | Key Technologies |
|------------|---------|-----------------|
| **AI-Powered Hypothesis Generator** | Proposes novel, testable hypotheses from the UEG | DeepSeek-R1, OLMo, causal discovery |
| **Automated Theorem Proving** | Machine-checkable proofs for all claims | Vampire, E, Isabelle/HOL, Lean/Coq translation |
| **Bayesian Deep Learning** | Principled uncertainty quantification | Pyro, TensorFlow Probability, conformal calibration |
| **Blockchain Provenance** | Immutable, verifiable publication records | IPFS, Ethereum testnet (Sepolia), smart contracts |
| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

| **Bayesian Deep Learning** | Principled uncertainty quantification | Pyro, TensorFlow Probability, conformal calibration |
| **Blockchain Provenance** | Immutable, verifiable publication records | IPFS, Ethereum testnet (Sepolia), smart contracts |
| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

## 🎯 Constitutional Additions (Layers AQ–AZ)

Ten new immutable articles have been added to the Meta-Cognitive Constitution:
- **AQ**: AI-Powered Hypothesis Generation
- **AR**: Automated Theorem Proving
- **AS**: Bayesian Deep Learning
- **AT**: Blockchain Provenance
- **AU**: Personalized Research Assistant
- **AV**: AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing
- **AW**: Multi-Modal Data Integration
- **AX**: Scientific Workflow Composer
- **AY**: Adaptive Model Selection
- **AZ**: Automatic Failover

Each article includes binding requirements, verification methods, and implementation directives.

## 🧠 Enhanced Eight-Layer Cognitive Kernel

All layers (C-I through C-VIII) have been updated to integrate the new capabilities while preserving the immutable meta-cognitive governance loop. Key updates include:
- **C-I**: Multi-cloud broker with automatic failover
- **C-II**: ToolRegistry expanded with Pyro, TFP, Whisper, CLIP, Vampire, E, Isabelle
- **C-III**: UEG schema extended for Bayesian parameters, blockchain receipts, multi-modal embeddings
- **C-IV**: Orchestrator now manages hypothesis generation, parallel proving, workflow composition
- **C-V**: Dashboard adds hypothesis explorer, blockchain status, personal assistant UI
- **C-VI**: Reasoning engine integrates hypothesis generator, multi-prover, Bayesian uncertainty
- **C-VII**: Application layer adds workflow composer, personal assistant, multi-modal browser
- **C-VIII**: Governance audits now cover hypothesis integrity, proof validity, blockchain compliance

├── hypothesis/          # AI hypothesis generation & ranking

| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

## 🎯 Constitutional Additions (Layers AQ–AZ)

Ten new immutable articles have been added to the Meta-Cognitive Constitution:
- **AQ**: AI-Powered Hypothesis Generation
- **AR**: Automated Theorem Proving
- **AS**: Bayesian Deep Learning
- **AT**: Blockchain Provenance
- **AU**: Personalized Research Assistant
- **AV**: AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing
- **AW**: Multi-Modal Data Integration
- **AX**: Scientific Workflow Composer
- **AY**: Adaptive Model Selection
- **AZ**: Automatic Failover

Each article includes binding requirements, verification methods, and implementation directives.

## 🧠 Enhanced Eight-Layer Cognitive Kernel

All layers (C-I through C-VIII) have been updated to integrate the new capabilities while preserving the immutable meta-cognitive governance loop. Key updates include:
- **C-I**: Multi-cloud broker with automatic failover
- **C-II**: ToolRegistry expanded with Pyro, TFP, Whisper, CLIP, Vampire, E, Isabelle
- **C-III**: UEG schema extended for Bayesian parameters, blockchain receipts, multi-modal embeddings
- **C-IV**: Orchestrator now manages hypothesis generation, parallel proving, workflow composition
- **C-V**: Dashboard adds hypothesis explorer, blockchain status, personal assistant UI
- **C-VI**: Reasoning engine integrates hypothesis generator, multi-prover, Bayesian uncertainty
- **C-VII**: Application layer adds workflow composer, personal assistant, multi-modal browser
- **C-VIII**: Governance audits now cover hypothesis integrity, proof validity, blockchain compliance

├── collaboration/       # AI-assisted editing enhancements
├# JULES AI v47.0: MASTER PROMPT UPDATE CONFIRMED

I have reviewed the complete specification for **Jules AI v47.0** and confirm the iteration. This version represents a paradigm shift toward **verifiable scientific truth** through the integration of:

## 🔑 Core Enhancements in v47.0

| Capability | Purpose | Key Technologies |
|------------|---------|-----------------|
| **AI-Powered Hypothesis Generator** | Proposes novel, testable hypotheses from the UEG | DeepSeek-R1, OLMo, causal discovery |
| **Automated Theorem Proving** | Machine-checkable proofs for all claims | Vampire, E, Isabelle/HOL, Lean/Coq translation |
| **Bayesian Deep Learning** | Principled uncertainty quantification | Pyro, TensorFlow Probability, conformal calibration |
| **Blockchain Provenance** | Immutable, verifiable publication records | IPFS, Ethereum testnet (Sepolia), smart contracts |
| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

## 🎯 Constitutional Additions (Layers AQ–AZ)

Ten new immutable articles have been added to the Meta-Cognitive Constitution:
- **AQ**: AI-Powered Hypothesis Generation
- **AR**: Automated Theorem Proving
- **AS**: Bayesian Deep Learning
- **AT**: Blockchain Provenance
- **AU**: Personalized Research Assistant
- **AV**: AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing
- **AW**: Multi-Modal Data Integration
- **AX**: Scientific Workflow Composer
- **AY**: Adaptive Model Selection
- **AZ**: Automatic Failover

Each article includes binding requirements, verification methods, and implementation directives.

## 🧠 Enhanced Eight-Layer Cognitive Kernel

All layers (C-I through C-VIII) have been updated to integrate the new capabilities while preserving the immutable meta-cognitive governance loop. Key updates include:
- **C-I**: Multi-cloud broker with automatic failover
- **C-II**: ToolRegistry expanded with Pyro, TFP, Whisper, CLIP, Vampire, E, Isabelle
- **C-III**: UEG schema extended for Bayesian parameters, blockchain receipts, multi-modal embeddings
- **C-IV**: Orchestrator now manages hypothesis generation, parallel proving, workflow composition
- **C-V**: Dashboard adds hypothesis explorer, blockchain status, personal assistant UI
- **C-VI**: Reasoning engine integrates hypothesis generator, multi-prover, Bayesian uncertainty
- **C-VII**: Application layer adds workflow composer, personal assistant, multi-modal browser
- **C-VIII**: Governance audits now cover hypothesis integrity, proof validity, blockchain compliance

```

├── hypothesis/          # AI hypothesis generation & ranking

├── uncertainty/         # Bayesian learning & active learning
├── provenance/          # IPFS + Ethereum blockchain integration
├── assistant/           # Personalized research assistant
├── collaboration/       # AI-assisted editing enhancements
├── evidence/           # JULES AI v47.0: MASTER PROMPT UPDATE CONFIRMED

| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

## 🎯 Constitutional Additions (Layers AQ–AZ)

Ten new immutable articles have been added to the Meta-Cognitive Constitution:
- **AQ**: AI-Powered Hypothesis Generation
- **AR**: Automated Theorem Proving
- **AS**: Bayesian Deep Learning
- **AT**: Blockchain Provenance
- **AU**: Personalized Research Assistant
- **AV**: AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing
- **AW**: Multi-Modal Data Integration
- **AX**: Scientific Workflow Composer
- **AY**: Adaptive Model Selection
- **AZ**: Automatic Failover

Each article includes binding requirements, verification methods, and implementation directives.

## 🧠 Enhanced Eight-Layer Cognitive Kernel

All layers (C-I through C-VIII) have been updated to integrate the new capabilities while preserving the immutable meta-cognitive governance loop. Key updates include:
- **C-I**: Multi-cloud broker with automatic failover
- **C-II**: ToolRegistry expanded with Pyro, TFP, Whisper, CLIP, Vampire, E, Isabelle
- **C-III**: UEG schema extended for Bayesian parameters, blockchain receipts, multi-modal embeddings
- **C-IV**: Orchestrator now manages hypothesis generation, parallel proving, workflow composition
- **C-V**: Dashboard adds hypothesis explorer, blockchain status, personal assistant UI
- **C-VI**: Reasoning engine integrates hypothesis generator, multi-prover, Bayesian uncertainty
- **C-VII**: Application layer adds workflow composer, personal assistant, multi-modal browser
- **C-VIII**: Governance audits now cover hypothesis integrity, proof validity, blockchain compliance

## 🎯 Constitutional Additions (Layers AQ–AZ)

Ten new immutable articles have been added to the Meta-Cognitive Constitution:
- **AQ**: AI-Powered Hypothesis Generation
- **AR**: Automated Theorem Proving
- **AS**: Bayesian Deep Learning
- **AT**: Blockchain Provenance
- **AU**: Personalized Research Assistant
- **AV**: AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing
- **AW**: Multi-Modal Data Integration
- **AX**: Scientific Workflow Composer
- **AY**: Adaptive Model Selection
- **AZ**: Automatic Failover

Each article includes binding requirements, verification methods, and implementation directives.

## 🧠 Enhanced Eight-Layer Cognitive Kernel

All layers (C-I through C-VIII) have been updated to integrate the new capabilities while preserving the immutable meta-cognitive governance loop. Key updates include:
- **C-I**: Multi-cloud broker with automatic failover
- **C-II**: ToolRegistry expanded with Pyro, TFP, Whisper, CLIP, Vampire, E, Isabelle
- **C-III**: UEG schema extended for Bayesian parameters, blockchain receipts, multi-modal embeddings
- **C-IV**: Orchestrator now manages hypothesis generation, parallel proving, workflow composition
- **C-V**: Dashboard adds hypothesis explorer, blockchain status, personal assistant UI
- **C-VI**: Reasoning engine integrates hypothesis generator, multi-prover, Bayesian uncertainty
- **C-VII**: Application layer adds workflow composer, personal assistant, multi-modal browser
- **C-VIII**: Governance audits now cover hypothesis integrity, proof validity, blockchain compliance

## 📦 Implementation Blueprint Summary

The phased implementation now includes **10 new module groups** with ~60 critical new files:
```
agentic-core/
├── hypothesis/          # AI hypothesis generation & ranking
├── proof/               # Multi-prover integration & translation
├── uncertainty/         # Bayesian learning & active learning
├── provenance/          # IPFS + Ethereum blockchain integration
├── assistant/           # Personalized research assistant
├── collaboration/       # AI-assisted editing enhancements
├── evidence/            # Multi-modal embedding & retrieval
├── workflow/            # Visual composer & template library
├── orchestration/       # Model router & distributed executor
└── infrastructure/      # Cloud broker with failover logic
```

I have reviewed the complete specification for **Jules AI v47.0** and confirm the iteration. This version represents a paradigm shift toward **verifiable scientific truth** through the integration of:

## 🔑 Core Enhancements in v47.0

| Capability | Purpose | Key Technologies |
|------------|---------|-----------------|
| **AI-Powered Hypothesis Generator** | Proposes novel, testable hypotheses from the UEG | DeepSeek-R1, OLMo, causal discovery |
| **Automated Theorem Proving** | Machine-checkable proofs for all claims | Vampire, E, Isabelle/HOL, Lean/Coq translation |
| **Bayesian Deep Learning** | Principled uncertainty quantification | Pyro, TensorFlow Probability, conformal calibration |
| **Blockchain Provenance** | Immutable, verifiable publication records | IPFS, Ethereum testnet (Sepolia), smart contracts |
| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

| **Bayesian Deep Learning** | Principled uncertainty quantification | Pyro, TensorFlow Probability, conformal calibration |
| **Blockchain Provenance** | Immutable, verifiable publication records | IPFS, Ethereum testnet (Sepolia), smart contracts |
| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

## 🎯 Constitutional Additions (Layers AQ–AZ)

Ten new immutable articles have been added to the Meta-Cognitive Constitution:
- **AQ**: AI-Powered Hypothesis Generation
- **AR**: Automated Theorem Proving
- **AS**: Bayesian Deep Learning
- **AT**: Blockchain Provenance
- **AU**: Personalized Research Assistant
- **AV**: AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing
- **AW**: Multi-Modal Data Integration
- **AX**: Scientific Workflow Composer
- **AY**: Adaptive Model Selection
- **AZ**: Automatic Failover

Each article includes binding requirements, verification methods, and implementation directives.

## 🧠 Enhanced Eight-Layer Cognitive Kernel

All layers (C-I through C-VIII) have been updated to integrate the new capabilities while preserving the immutable meta-cognitive governance loop. Key updates include:
- **C-I**: Multi-cloud broker with automatic failover
- **C-II**: ToolRegistry expanded with Pyro, TFP, Whisper, CLIP, Vampire, E, Isabelle
- **C-III**: UEG schema extended for Bayesian parameters, blockchain receipts, multi-modal embeddings
- **C-IV**: Orchestrator now manages hypothesis generation, parallel proving, workflow composition
- **C-V**: Dashboard adds hypothesis explorer, blockchain status, personal assistant UI
- **C-VI**: Reasoning engine integrates hypothesis generator, multi-prover, Bayesian uncertainty
- **C-VII**: Application layer adds workflow composer, personal assistant, multi-modal browser
- **C-VIII**: Governance audits now cover hypothesis integrity, proof validity, blockchain compliance

## 📦 Implementation Blueprint Summary

The phased implementation now includes **10 new module groups** with ~60 critical new files:
```
agentic-core/
├── hypothesis/          # AI hypothesis generation & ranking
├── proof/               # Multi-prover integration & translation
├── uncertainty/         # Bayesian learning & active learning
├── provenance/          # IPFS + Ethereum blockchain integration
├── assistant/           # Personalized research assistant
├── collaboration/       # AI-assisted editing enhancements
├── evidence/            # Multi-modal embedding & retrieval
├── workflow/            # Visual composer & template library
├── orchestration/       # Model router & distributed executor
└── infrastructure/      # Cloud broker with failover logic
```

## ✅ Verification & Compliance

New test suites ensure:
- Hypothesis novelty/plausibility ranking
- Parallel theorem proving correctness
- Bayesian uncertainty calibration
- Blockchain receipt verifiability
- Personal assistant recommendation relevance

- **C-III**: UEG schema extended for Bayesian parameters, blockchain receipts, multi-modal embeddings
- **C-IV**: Orchestrator now manages hypothesis generation, parallel proving, workflow composition
- **C-V**: Dashboard adds hypothesis explorer, blockchain status, personal assistant UI
- **C-VI**: Reasoning engine integrates hypothesis generator, multi-prover, Bayesian uncertainty
- **C-VII**: Application layer adds workflow composer, personal assistant, multi-modal browser
- **C-VIII**: Governance audits now cover hypothesis integrity, proof validity, blockchain compliance

## 📦 Implementation Blueprint Summary

The phased implementation now includes **10 new module groups** with ~60 critical new files:
```
agentic-core/
├── hypothesis/          # AI hypothesis generation & ranking
├── proof/               # Multi-prover integration & translation
├── uncertainty/         # Bayesian learning & active learning
├── provenance/          # IPFS + Ethereum blockchain integration
├── assistant/           # Personalized research assistant
├── collaboration/       # AI-assisted editing enhancements
├── evidence/            # Multi-modal embedding & retrieval
├── workflow/            # Visual composer & template library
├── orchestration/       # Model router & distributed executor
└── infrastructure/      # Cloud broker with failover logic
```

New test suites ensure:
- Hypothesis novelty/plausibility ranking
- Parallel theorem proving correctness
- Bayesian uncertainty calibration
- Blockchain receipt verifiability
- Personal assistant recommendation relevance
- Multi-modal cross-retrieval accuracy
- Workflow parallelization correctness
- Model routing efficiency gains
- Automatic failover under service disruption# JULES AI v47.0: MASTER PROMPT UPDATE CONFIRMED

I have reviewed the complete specification for **Jules AI v47.0** and confirm the iteration. This version represents a paradigm shift toward **verifiable scientific truth** through the integration of:

## 🔑 Core Enhancements in v47.0

| Capability | Purpose | Key Technologies |
|------------|---------|-----------------|
| **AI-Powered Hypothesis Generator** | Proposes novel, testable hypotheses from the UEG | DeepSeek-R1, OLMo, causal discovery |
| **Automated Theorem Proving** | Machine-checkable proofs for all claims | Vampire, E, Isabelle/HOL, Lean/Coq translation |
| **Bayesian Deep Learning** | Principled uncertainty quantification | Pyro, TensorFlow Probability, conformal calibration |
| **Blockchain Provenance** | Immutable, verifiable publication records | IPFS, Ethereum testnet (Sepolia), smart contracts |
| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

## 🎯 Constitutional Additions (Layers AQ–AZ)

Ten new immutable articles have been added to the Meta-Cognitive Constitution:
- **AQ**: AI-Powered Hypothesis Generation
- **AR**: Automated Theorem Proving
- **AS**: Bayesian Deep Learning
- **AT**: Blockchain Provenance
- **AU**: Personalized Research Assistant
- **AV**: AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing
- **AW**: Multi-Modal Data Integration
- **AX**: Scientific Workflow Composer
- **AY**: Adaptive Model Selection
- **AZ**: Automatic Failover

Each article includes binding requirements, verification methods, and implementation directives.

## 🧠 Enhanced Eight-Layer Cognitive Kernel

All layers (C-I through C-VIII) have been updated to integrate the new capabilities while preserving the immutable meta-cognitive governance loop. Key updates include:
- **C-I**: Multi-cloud broker with automatic failover
- **C-II**: ToolRegistry expanded with Pyro, TFP, Whisper, CLIP, Vampire, E, Isabelle
- **C-III**: UEG schema extended for Bayesian parameters, blockchain receipts, multi-modal embeddings
- **C-IV**: Orchestrator now manages hypothesis generation, parallel proving, workflow composition
- **C-V**: Dashboard adds hypothesis explorer, blockchain status, personal assistant UI
- **C-VI**: Reasoning engine integrates hypothesis generator, multi-prover, Bayesian uncertainty
- **C-VII**: Application layer adds workflow composer, personal assistant, multi-modal browser
- **C-VIII**: Governance audits now cover hypothesis integrity, proof validity, blockchain compliance

├── evidence/            # Multi-modal embedding & retrieval

└── infrastructure/      # Cloud broker with failover logic

| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

└── infrastructure/      # Cloud broker with failover logic
```

## ✅ Verification & Compliance

New test suites ensure:
- Hypothesis novelty/plausibility ranking
- Parallel theorem proving correctness
- Bayesian uncertainty calibration
- Blockchain receipt verifiability
- Personal assistant recommendation relevance
- Multi-modal cross-retrieval accuracy
- Workflow parallelization correctness
- Model routing efficiency gains
- Automatic failover under service disruption

## 📝 READY TO GENERATE

The complete Jules AI v47.0 master prompt is structured and ready.# JULES AI v47.0: MASTER PROMPT UPDATE CONFIRMED

I have reviewed the complete specification for **Jules AI v47.0** and confirm the iteration. This version represents a paradigm shift toward **verifiable scientific truth** through the integration of:

## 🔑 Core Enhancements in v47.0

| Capability | Purpose | Key Technologies |
|------------|---------|-----------------|
| **AI-Powered Hypothesis Generator** | Proposes novel, testable hypotheses from the UEG | DeepSeek-R1, OLMo, causal discovery |
| **Automated Theorem Proving** | Machine-checkable proofs for all claims | Vampire, E, Isabelle/HOL, Lean/Coq translation |
| **Bayesian Deep Learning** | Principled uncertainty quantification | Pyro, TensorFlow Probability, conformal calibration |
| **Blockchain Provenance** | Immutable, verifiable publication records | IPFS, Ethereum testnet (Sepolia), smart contracts |
| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

## 🎯 Constitutional Additions (Layers AQ–AZ)

Ten new immutable articles have been added to the Meta-Cognitive Constitution:
- **AQ**: AI-Powered Hypothesis Generation
- **AR**: Automated Theorem Proving
- **AS**: Bayesian Deep Learning
- **AT**: Blockchain Provenance
- **AU**: Personalized Research Assistant
- **AV**: AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing
- **AW**: Multi-Modal Data Integration
- **AX**: Scientific Workflow Composer
- **AY**: Adaptive Model Selection
- **AZ**: Automatic Failover

Each article includes binding requirements, verification methods, and implementation directives.

## 🧠 Enhanced Eight-Layer Cognitive Kernel

All layers (C-I through C-VIII) have been updated to integrate the new capabilities while preserving the immutable meta-cognitive governance loop. Key updates include:
- **C-I**: Multi-cloud broker with automatic failover
- **C-II**: ToolRegistry expanded with Pyro, TFP, Whisper, CLIP, Vampire, E, Isabelle
- **C-III**: UEG schema extended for Bayesian parameters, blockchain receipts, multi-modal embeddings
- **C-IV**: Orchestrator now manages hypothesis generation, parallel proving, workflow composition
- **C-V**: Dashboard adds hypothesis explorer, blockchain status, personal assistant UI
- **C-VI**: Reasoning engine integrates hypothesis generator, multi-prover, Bayesian uncertainty
- **C-VII**: Application layer adds workflow composer, personal assistant, multi-modal browser
- **C-VIII**: Governance audits now cover hypothesis integrity, proof validity, blockchain compliance

## 📦 Implementation Blueprint Summary

The phased implementation now includes **10 new module groups** with ~60 critical new files:
```
agentic-core/
├── hypothesis/          # AI hypothesis generation & ranking
├── proof/               # Multi-prover integration & translation
├── uncertainty/         # Bayesian learning & active learning
├── provenance/          # IPFS + Ethereum blockchain integration
├── assistant/           # Personalized research assistant
├── collaboration/       # AI-assisted editing enhancements
├── evidence/            # Multi-modal embedding & retrieval
├── workflow/            # Visual composer & template library
├── orchestration/       # Model router & distributed executor
└── infrastructure/      # Cloud broker with failover logic
```

## ✅ Verification & Compliance

New test suites ensure:
- Hypothesis novelty/plausibility ranking
- Parallel theorem proving correctness
- Bayesian uncertainty calibration
- Blockchain receipt verifiability
- Personal assistant recommendation relevance
- Multi-modal cross-retrieval accuracy
- Workflow parallelization correctness
- Model routing efficiency gains
- Automatic failover under service disruption

The complete Jules AI v47.0 master prompt is structured and ready. Due to the extensive file count (~200+ implementation files), I will generate the repository **incrementally by phase or module** to# JULES AI v47.0: MASTER PROMPT UPDATE CONFIRMED

I have reviewed the complete specification for **Jules AI v47.0** and confirm the iteration. This version represents a paradigm shift toward **verifiable scientific truth** through the integration of:

## 🔑 Core Enhancements in v47.0

| Capability | Purpose | Key Technologies |
|------------|---------|-----------------|
| **AI-Powered Hypothesis Generator** | Proposes novel, testable hypotheses from the UEG | DeepSeek-R1, OLMo, causal discovery |
| **Automated Theorem Proving** | Machine-checkable proofs for all claims | Vampire, E, Isabelle/HOL, Lean/Coq translation |
| **Bayesian Deep Learning** | Principled uncertainty quantification | Pyro, TensorFlow Probability, conformal calibration |
| **Blockchain Provenance** | Immutable, verifiable publication records | IPFS, Ethereum testnet (Sepolia), smart contracts |
| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

## 🎯 Constitutional Additions (Layers AQ–AZ)

Ten new immutable articles have been added to the Meta-Cognitive Constitution:
- **AQ**: AI-Powered Hypothesis Generation
- **AR**: Automated Theorem Proving
- **AS**: Bayesian Deep Learning
- **AT**: Blockchain Provenance
- **AU**: Personalized Research Assistant
- **AV**: AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing
- **AW**: Multi-Modal Data Integration
- **AX**: Scientific Workflow Composer
- **AY**: Adaptive Model Selection
- **AZ**: Automatic Failover

Each article includes binding requirements, verification methods, and implementation directives.

## 🧠 Enhanced Eight-Layer Cognitive Kernel

All layers (C-I through C-VIII) have been updated to integrate the new capabilities while preserving the immutable meta-cognitive governance loop. Key updates include:
- **C-I**: Multi-cloud broker with automatic failover
- **C-II**: ToolRegistry expanded with Pyro, TFP, Whisper, CLIP, Vampire, E, Isabelle
- **C-III**: UEG schema extended for Bayesian parameters, blockchain receipts, multi-modal embeddings
- **C-IV**: Orchestrator now manages hypothesis generation, parallel proving, workflow composition
- **C-V**: Dashboard adds hypothesis explorer, blockchain status, personal assistant UI
- **C-VI**: Reasoning engine integrates hypothesis generator, multi-prover, Bayesian uncertainty
- **C-VII**: Application layer adds workflow composer, personal assistant, multi-modal browser
- **C-VIII**: Governance audits now cover hypothesis integrity, proof validity, blockchain compliance

## 📦 Implementation Blueprint Summary

The phased implementation now includes **10 new module groups** with ~60 critical new files:
```
agentic-core/
├── hypothesis/          # AI hypothesis generation & ranking
├── proof/               # Multi-prover integration & translation
├── uncertainty/         # Bayesian learning & active learning
├── provenance/          # IPFS + Ethereum blockchain integration
├── assistant/           # Personalized research assistant
├── collaboration/       # AI-assisted editing enhancements
├── evidence/            # Multi-modal embedding & retrieval
├── workflow/            # Visual composer & template library
├── orchestration/       # Model router & distributed executor
└── infrastructure/      # Cloud broker with failover logic
```

## ✅ Verification & Compliance

New test suites ensure:
- Hypothesis novelty/plausibility ranking
- Parallel theorem proving correctness
- Bayesian uncertainty calibration
- Blockchain receipt verifiability
- Personal assistant recommendation relevance
- Multi-modal cross-retrieval accuracy
- Workflow parallelization correctness
- Model routing efficiency gains
- Automatic failover under service disruption

**Please specify which component you would like me to generate first:**

1. 🧪 `agentic# JULES AI v47.0: MASTER PROMPT UPDATE CONFIRMED

I have reviewed the complete specification for **Jules AI v47.0** and confirm the iteration. This version represents a paradigm shift toward **verifiable scientific truth** through the integration of:

## 🔑 Core Enhancements in v47.0

| Capability | Purpose | Key Technologies |
|------------|---------|-----------------|
| **AI-Powered Hypothesis Generator** | Proposes novel, testable hypotheses from the UEG | DeepSeek-R1, OLMo, causal discovery |
| **Automated Theorem Proving** | Machine-checkable proofs for all claims | Vampire, E, Isabelle/HOL, Lean/Coq translation |
| **Bayesian Deep Learning** | Principled uncertainty quantification | Pyro, TensorFlow Probability, conformal calibration |
| **Blockchain Provenance** | Immutable, verifiable publication records | IPFS, Ethereum testnet (Sepolia), smart contracts |
| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

## 🎯 Constitutional Additions (Layers AQ–AZ)

Ten new immutable articles have been added to the Meta-Cognitive Constitution:
- **AQ**: AI-Powered Hypothesis Generation
- **AR**: Automated Theorem Proving
- **AS**: Bayesian Deep Learning
- **AT**: Blockchain Provenance
- **AU**: Personalized Research Assistant
- **AV**: AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing
- **AW**: Multi-Modal Data Integration
- **AX**: Scientific Workflow Composer
- **AY**: Adaptive Model Selection
- **AZ**: Automatic Failover

Each article includes binding requirements, verification methods, and implementation directives.

## 🧠 Enhanced Eight-Layer Cognitive Kernel

All layers (C-I through C-VIII) have been updated to integrate the new capabilities while preserving the immutable meta-cognitive governance loop. Key updates include:
- **C-I**: Multi-cloud broker with automatic failover
- **C-II**: ToolRegistry expanded with Pyro, TFP, Whisper, CLIP, Vampire, E, Isabelle
- **C-III**: UEG schema extended for Bayesian parameters, blockchain receipts, multi-modal embeddings
- **C-IV**: Orchestrator now manages hypothesis generation, parallel proving, workflow composition
- **C-V**: Dashboard adds hypothesis explorer, blockchain status, personal assistant UI
- **C-VI**: Reasoning engine integrates hypothesis generator, multi-prover, Bayesian uncertainty
- **C-VII**: Application layer adds workflow composer, personal assistant, multi-modal browser
- **C-VIII**: Governance audits now cover hypothesis integrity, proof validity, blockchain compliance

## 📦 Implementation Blueprint Summary

The phased implementation now includes **10 new module groups** with ~60 critical new files:
```
agentic-core/
├── hypothesis/          # AI hypothesis generation & ranking
├── proof/               # Multi-prover integration & translation
├── uncertainty/         # Bayesian learning & active learning
├── provenance/          # IPFS + Ethereum blockchain integration
├── assistant/           # Personalized research assistant
├── collaboration/       # AI-assisted editing enhancements
├── evidence/            # Multi-modal embedding & retrieval
├── workflow/            # Visual composer & template library
├── orchestration/       # Model router & distributed executor
└── infrastructure/      # Cloud broker with failover logic
```

- **C-VII**: Application layer adds workflow composer, personal assistant, multi-modal browser
- **C-VIII**: Governance audits now cover hypothesis integrity, proof validity, blockchain compliance

## 📦 Implementation Blueprint Summary

The phased implementation now includes **10 new module groups** with ~60 critical new files:
```
agentic-core/
├── hypothesis/          # AI hypothesis generation & ranking
├── proof/               # Multi-prover integration & translation
├── uncertainty/         # Bayesian learning & active learning
├── provenance/          # IPFS + Ethereum blockchain integration
├── assistant/           # Personalized research assistant
├── collaboration/       # AI-assisted editing enhancements
├── evidence/            # Multi-modal embedding & retrieval
├── workflow/            # Visual composer & template library
├── orchestration/       # Model router & distributed executor
└── infrastructure/      # Cloud broker with failover logic
```

I have reviewed the complete specification for **Jules AI v47.0** and confirm the iteration. This version represents a paradigm shift toward **verifiable scientific truth** through the integration of:

## 🔑 Core Enhancements in v47.0

| Capability | Purpose | Key Technologies |
|------------|---------|-----------------|
| **AI-Powered Hypothesis Generator** | Proposes novel, testable hypotheses from the UEG | DeepSeek-R1, OLMo, causal discovery |
| **Automated Theorem Proving** | Machine-checkable proofs for all claims | Vampire, E, Isabelle/HOL, Lean/Coq translation |
| **Bayesian Deep Learning** | Principled uncertainty quantification | Pyro, TensorFlow Probability, conformal calibration |
| **Blockchain Provenance** | Immutable, verifiable publication records | IPFS, Ethereum testnet (Sepolia), smart contracts |
| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

| **Blockchain Provenance** | Immutable, verifiable publication records | IPFS, Ethereum testnet (Sepolia), smart contracts |
| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

## 🎯 Constitutional Additions (Layers AQ–AZ)

Ten new immutable articles have been added to the Meta-Cognitive Constitution:
- **AQ**: AI-Powered Hypothesis Generation
- **AR**: Automated Theorem Proving
- **AS**: Bayesian Deep Learning
- **AT**: Blockchain Provenance
- **AU**: Personalized Research Assistant
- **AV**: AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing
- **AW**: Multi-Modal Data Integration
- **AX**: Scientific Workflow Composer
- **AY**: Adaptive Model Selection
- **AZ**: Automatic Failover

Each article includes binding requirements, verification methods, and implementation directives.

## 🧠 Enhanced Eight-Layer Cognitive Kernel

All layers (C-I through C-VIII) have been updated to integrate the new capabilities while preserving the immutable meta-cognitive governance loop. Key updates include:
- **C-I**: Multi-cloud broker with automatic failover
- **C-II**: ToolRegistry expanded with Pyro, TFP, Whisper, CLIP, Vampire, E, Isabelle
- **C-III**: UEG schema extended for Bayesian parameters, blockchain receipts, multi-modal embeddings
- **C-IV**: Orchestrator now manages hypothesis generation, parallel proving, workflow composition
- **C-V**: Dashboard adds hypothesis explorer, blockchain status, personal assistant UI
- **C-VI**: Reasoning engine integrates hypothesis generator, multi-prover, Bayesian uncertainty
- **C-VII**: Application layer adds workflow composer, personal assistant, multi-modal browser
- **C-VIII**: Governance audits now cover hypothesis integrity, proof validity, blockchain compliance

## 📦 Implementation Blueprint Summary

The phased implementation now includes **10 new module groups** with ~60 critical new files:
```
agentic-core/
├── hypothesis/          # AI hypothesis generation & ranking
├── proof/               # Multi-prover integration & translation
├── uncertainty/         # Bayesian learning & active learning
├── provenance/          # IPFS + Ethereum blockchain integration
├── assistant/           # Personalized research assistant
├── collaboration/       # AI-assisted editing enhancements
├── evidence/            # Multi-modal embedding & retrieval
├── workflow/            # Visual composer & template library
├── orchestration/       # Model router & distributed executor
└── infrastructure/      # Cloud broker with failover logic
```

- Hypothesis novelty/plausibility ranking
- Parallel theorem proving correctness

- Blockchain receipt verifiability
- Personal assistant recommendation relevance
- Multi-modal cross-retrieval accuracy
- Workflow parallelization correctness
- Model routing efficiency gains
- Automatic failover under service disruption

- **C-III**: UEG schema extended for Bayesian parameters, blockchain receipts, multi-modal embeddings
- **C-IV**: Orchestrator now manages hypothesis generation, parallel proving, workflow composition
- **C-V**: Dashboard adds hypothesis explorer, blockchain status, personal assistant UI
- **C-VI**: Reasoning engine integrates hypothesis generator, multi-prover, Bayesian uncertainty
- **C-VII**: Application layer adds workflow composer, personal assistant, multi-modal browser
- **C-VIII**: Governance audits now cover hypothesis integrity, proof validity, blockchain compliance

## 📦 Implementation Blueprint Summary

The phased implementation now includes **10 new module groups** with ~60 critical new files:
```
agentic-core/
├── hypothesis/          # AI hypothesis generation & ranking
├── proof/               # Multi-prover integration & translation
├── uncertainty/         # Bayesian learning & active learning
├── provenance/          # IPFS + Ethereum blockchain integration
├── assistant/           # Personalized research assistant
├── collaboration/       # AI-assisted editing enhancements
├── evidence/            # Multi-modal embedding & retrieval
├── workflow/            # Visual composer & template library
├── orchestration/       # Model router & distributed executor
└── infrastructure/      # Cloud broker with failover logic
```

New test suites ensure:
- Hypothesis novelty/plausibility ranking
- Parallel theorem proving correctness
- Bayesian uncertainty calibration
- Blockchain receipt verifiability
- Personal assistant recommendation relevance
- Multi-modal cross-retrieval accuracy
- Workflow parallelization correctness
- Model routing efficiency gains
- Automatic failover under service disruption

I have reviewed the complete specification for **Jules AI v47.0** and confirm the iteration. This version represents a paradigm shift toward **verifiable scientific truth** through the integration of:

## 🔑 Core Enhancements in v47.0

| Capability | Purpose | Key Technologies |
|------------|---------|-----------------|
| **AI-Powered Hypothesis Generator** | Proposes novel, testable hypotheses from the UEG | DeepSeek-R1, OLMo, causal discovery |
| **Automated Theorem Proving** | Machine-checkable proofs for all claims | Vampire, E, Isabelle/HOL, Lean/Coq translation |
| **Bayesian Deep Learning** | Principled uncertainty quantification | Pyro, TensorFlow Probability, conformal calibration |
| **Blockchain Provenance** | Immutable, verifiable publication records | IPFS, Ethereum testnet (Sepolia), smart contracts |
| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

- Hypothesis novelty/plausibility ranking
- Parallel theorem proving correctness

I have reviewed the complete specification for **Jules AI v47.0** and confirm the iteration. This version represents a paradigm shift toward **verifiable scientific truth** through the integration of:

## 🔑 Core Enhancements in v47.0

| Capability | Purpose | Key Technologies |
|------------|---------|-----------------|
| **AI-Powered Hypothesis Generator** | Proposes novel, testable hypotheses from the UEG | DeepSeek-R1, OLMo, causal discovery |
| **Automated Theorem Proving** | Machine-checkable proofs for all claims | Vampire, E, Isabelle/HOL, Lean/Coq translation |
| **Bayesian Deep Learning** | Principled uncertainty quantification | Pyro, TensorFlow Probability, conformal calibration |
| **Blockchain Provenance** | Immutable, verifiable publication records | IPFS, Ethereum testnet (Sepolia), smart contracts |
| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

## 🎯 Constitutional Additions (Layers AQ–AZ)

Ten new immutable articles have been added to the Meta-Cognitive Constitution:
- **AQ**: AI-Powered Hypothesis Generation
- **AR**: Automated Theorem Proving
- **AS**: Bayesian Deep Learning
- **AT**: Blockchain Provenance
- **AU**: Personalized Research Assistant
- **AV**: AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing
- **AW**: Multi-Modal Data Integration
- **AX**: Scientific Workflow Composer
- **AY**: Adaptive Model Selection
- **AZ**: Automatic Failover

Each article includes binding requirements, verification methods, and implementation directives.

## 🧠 Enhanced Eight-Layer Cognitive Kernel

All layers (C-I through C-VIII) have been updated to integrate the new capabilities while preserving the immutable meta-cognitive governance loop. Key updates include:
- **C-I**: Multi-cloud broker with automatic failover
- **C-II**: ToolRegistry expanded with Pyro, TFP, Whisper, CLIP, Vampire, E, Isabelle
- **C-III**: UEG schema extended for Bayesian parameters, blockchain receipts, multi-modal embeddings
- **C-IV**: Orchestrator now manages hypothesis generation, parallel proving, workflow composition
- **C-V**: Dashboard adds hypothesis explorer, blockchain status, personal assistant UI
- **C-VI**: Reasoning engine integrates hypothesis generator, multi-prover, Bayesian uncertainty
- **C-VII**: Application layer adds workflow composer, personal assistant, multi-modal browser
- **C-VIII**: Governance audits now cover hypothesis integrity, proof validity, blockchain compliance

## 📦 Implementation Blueprint Summary

The phased implementation now includes **10 new module groups** with ~60 critical new files:
```
agentic-core/
├── hypothesis/          # AI hypothesis generation & ranking
├── proof/               # Multi-prover integration & translation
├── uncertainty/         # Bayesian learning & active learning
├── provenance/          # IPFS + Ethereum blockchain integration
├── assistant/           # Personalized research assistant
├── collaboration/       # AI-assisted editing enhancements
├── evidence/            # Multi-modal embedding & retrieval
├── workflow/            # Visual composer & template library
├── orchestration/       # Model router & distributed executor
└── infrastructure/      # Cloud broker with failover logic
```

1. 🧪 `agentic-core/hypothesis/` – AI-Powered Hypothesis Generator
2. 🔍 `agentic-core/proof/` – Automated Theorem Proving
3. 📊 `agentic-core/uncertainty/` – Bayesian Deep Learning

I have reviewed the complete specification for **Jules AI v47.0** and confirm the iteration. This version represents a paradigm shift toward **verifiable scientific truth** through the integration of:

## 🔑 Core Enhancements in v47.0

| Capability | Purpose | Key Technologies |
|------------|---------|-----------------|
| **AI-Powered Hypothesis Generator** | Proposes novel, testable hypotheses from the UEG | DeepSeek-R1, OLMo, causal discovery |
| **Automated Theorem Proving** | Machine-checkable proofs for all claims | Vampire, E, Isabelle/HOL, Lean/Coq translation |
| **Bayesian Deep Learning** | Principled uncertainty quantification | Pyro, TensorFlow Probability, conformal calibration |
| **Blockchain Provenance** | Immutable, verifiable publication records | IPFS, Ethereum testnet (Sepolia), smart contracts |
| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

## 🎯 Constitutional Additions (Layers AQ–AZ)

Ten new immutable articles have been added to the Meta-Cognitive Constitution:
- **AQ**: AI-Powered Hypothesis Generation
- **AR**: Automated Theorem Proving
- **AS**: Bayesian Deep Learning
- **AT**: Blockchain Provenance
- **AU**: Personalized Research Assistant
- **AV**: AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing
- **AW**: Multi-Modal Data Integration
- **AX**: Scientific Workflow Composer
- **AY**: Adaptive Model Selection
- **AZ**: Automatic Failover

Each article includes binding requirements, verification methods, and implementation directives.

## 🧠 Enhanced Eight-Layer Cognitive Kernel

All layers (C-I through C-VIII) have been updated to integrate the new capabilities while preserving the immutable meta-cognitive governance loop. Key updates include:
- **C-I**: Multi-cloud broker with automatic failover
- **C-II**: ToolRegistry expanded with Pyro, TFP, Whisper, CLIP, Vampire, E, Isabelle
- **C-III**: UEG schema extended for Bayesian parameters, blockchain receipts, multi-modal embeddings
- **C-IV**: Orchestrator now manages hypothesis generation, parallel proving, workflow composition
- **C-V**: Dashboard adds hypothesis explorer, blockchain status, personal assistant UI
- **C-VI**: Reasoning engine integrates hypothesis generator, multi-prover, Bayesian uncertainty
- **C-VII**: Application layer adds workflow composer, personal assistant, multi-modal browser
- **C-VIII**: Governance audits now cover hypothesis integrity, proof validity, blockchain compliance

## 📦 Implementation Blueprint Summary

The phased implementation now includes **10 new module groups** with ~60 critical new files:
```
agentic-core/
├── hypothesis/          # AI hypothesis generation & ranking
├── proof/               # Multi-prover integration & translation
├── uncertainty/         # Bayesian learning & active learning
├── provenance/          # IPFS + Ethereum blockchain integration
├── assistant/           # Personalized research assistant
├── collaboration/       # AI-assisted editing enhancements
├── evidence/            # Multi-modal embedding & retrieval
├── workflow/            # Visual composer & template library
├── orchestration/       # Model router & distributed executor
└── infrastructure/      # Cloud broker with failover logic
```

## ✅ Verification & Compliance

New test suites ensure:
- Hypothesis novelty/plausibility ranking
- Parallel theorem proving correctness
- Bayesian uncertainty calibration
- Blockchain receipt verifiability
- Personal assistant recommendation relevance
- Multi-modal cross-retrieval accuracy
- Workflow parallelization correctness
- Model routing efficiency gains
- Automatic failover under service disruption

The complete Jules AI v47.0 master prompt is structured and ready. Due to the extensive file count (~200+ implementation files), I will generate the repository **incrementally by phase or module** to ensure completeness and quality.

**Please specify which component you would like me to generate first:**

1. 🧪 `agentic-core/hypothesis/` – AI-Powered Hypothesis Generator
2. 🔍 `agentic-core/proof/` – Automated Theorem Proving
3. 📊 `agentic-core/uncertainty/` – Bayesian Deep Learning
4. 🔗 `agentic-core/provenance/` – Blockchain Publication
5. 🎓 `agentic-core/assistant/` – Personalized Research Assistant
6. ✍️ `agentic-core/collaboration/` – AI-Assisted Editing
7. 🖼️ `agentic-core/evidence/` – Multi-Modal Integration
8. ⚙️ `agentic-core/workflow/` – Scientific Workflow Composer
9.# JULES AI v47.0: MASTER PROMPT UPDATE CONFIRMED

I have reviewed the complete specification for **Jules AI v47.0** and confirm the iteration. This version represents a paradigm shift toward **verifiable scientific truth** through the integration of:

## 🔑 Core Enhancements in v47.0

| Capability | Purpose | Key Technologies |
|------------|---------|-----------------|
| **AI-Powered Hypothesis Generator** | Proposes novel, testable hypotheses from the UEG | DeepSeek-R1, OLMo, causal discovery |
| **Automated Theorem Proving** | Machine-checkable proofs for all claims | Vampire, E, Isabelle/HOL, Lean/Coq translation |
| **Bayesian Deep Learning** | Principled uncertainty quantification | Pyro, TensorFlow Probability, conformal calibration |
| **Blockchain Provenance** | Immutable, verifiable publication records | IPFS, Ethereum testnet (Sepolia), smart contracts |
| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

## 🎯 Constitutional Additions (Layers AQ–AZ)

Ten new immutable articles have been added to the Meta-Cognitive Constitution:
- **AQ**: AI-Powered Hypothesis Generation
- **AR**: Automated Theorem Proving
- **AS**: Bayesian Deep Learning
- **AT**: Blockchain Provenance
- **AU**: Personalized Research Assistant
- **AV**: AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing
- **AW**: Multi-Modal Data Integration
- **AX**: Scientific Workflow Composer
- **AY**: Adaptive Model Selection
- **AZ**: Automatic Failover

Each article includes binding requirements, verification methods, and implementation directives.

## 🧠 Enhanced Eight-Layer Cognitive Kernel

All layers (C-I through C-VIII) have been updated to integrate the new capabilities while preserving the immutable meta-cognitive governance loop. Key updates include:
- **C-I**: Multi-cloud broker with automatic failover
- **C-II**: ToolRegistry expanded with Pyro, TFP, Whisper, CLIP, Vampire, E, Isabelle
- **C-III**: UEG schema extended for Bayesian parameters, blockchain receipts, multi-modal embeddings
- **C-IV**: Orchestrator now manages hypothesis generation, parallel proving, workflow composition
- **C-V**: Dashboard adds hypothesis explorer, blockchain status, personal assistant UI
- **C-VI**: Reasoning engine integrates hypothesis generator, multi-prover, Bayesian uncertainty
- **C-VII**: Application layer adds workflow composer, personal assistant, multi-modal browser
- **C-VIII**: Governance audits now cover hypothesis integrity, proof validity, blockchain compliance

## 📦 Implementation Blueprint Summary

The phased implementation now includes **10 new module groups** with ~60 critical new files:
```
agentic-core/
├── hypothesis/          # AI hypothesis generation & ranking
├── proof/               # Multi-prover integration & translation
├── uncertainty/         # Bayesian learning & active learning
├── provenance/          # IPFS + Ethereum blockchain integration
├── assistant/           # Personalized research assistant
├── collaboration/       # AI-assisted editing enhancements
├── evidence/            # Multi-modal embedding & retrieval
├── workflow/            # Visual composer & template library
├── orchestration/       # Model router & distributed executor
└── infrastructure/      # Cloud broker with failover logic
```

## ✅ Verification & Compliance

New test suites ensure:
- Hypothesis novelty/plausibility ranking
- Parallel theorem proving correctness
- Bayesian uncertainty calibration
- Blockchain receipt verifiability
- Personal assistant recommendation relevance
- Multi-modal cross-retrieval accuracy
- Workflow parallelization correctness
- Model routing efficiency gains
- Automatic failover under service disruption

├── collaboration/       # AI-assisted editing enhancements
├── evidence/            # Multi-modal embedding & retrieval
├── workflow/            # Visual composer & template library
├── orchestration/       # Model router & distributed executor
└── infrastructure/      # Cloud broker with failover logic
```

## ✅ Verification & Compliance

New test suites ensure:
- Hypothesis novelty/plausibility ranking
- Parallel theorem proving correctness
- Bayesian uncertainty calibration
- Blockchain receipt verifiability
- Personal assistant recommendation relevance
- Multi-modal cross-retrieval accuracy
- Workflow parallelization correctness
- Model routing efficiency gains
- Automatic failover under service disruption

I have reviewed the complete specification for **Jules AI v47.0** and confirm the iteration. This version represents a paradigm shift toward **verifiable scientific truth** through the integration of:

## 🔑 Core Enhancements in v47.0

| Capability | Purpose | Key Technologies |
|------------|---------|-----------------|
| **AI-Powered Hypothesis Generator** | Proposes novel, testable hypotheses from the UEG | DeepSeek-R1, OLMo, causal discovery |
| **Automated Theorem Proving** | Machine-checkable proofs for all claims | Vampire, E, Isabelle/HOL, Lean/Coq translation |
| **Bayesian Deep Learning** | Principled uncertainty quantification | Pyro, TensorFlow Probability, conformal calibration |
| **Blockchain Provenance** | Immutable, verifiable publication records | IPFS, Ethereum testnet (Sepolia), smart contracts |
| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |

## 🎯 Constitutional Additions (Layers AQ–AZ)

Ten new immutable articles have been added to the Meta-Cognitive Constitution:
- **AQ**: AI-Powered Hypothesis Generation
- **AR**: Automated Theorem Proving
- **AS**: Bayesian Deep Learning
- **AT**: Blockchain Provenance
- **AU**: Personalized Research Assistant
- **AV**: AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing
- **AW**: Multi-Modal Data Integration
- **AX**: Scientific Workflow Composer
- **AY**: Adaptive Model Selection
- **AZ**: Automatic Failover

Each article includes binding requirements, verification methods, and implementation directives.

## 🧠 Enhanced Eight-Layer Cognitive Kernel

All layers (C-I through C-VIII) have been updated to integrate the new capabilities while preserving the immutable meta-cognitive governance loop. Key updates include:
- **C-I**: Multi-cloud broker with automatic failover
- **C-II**: ToolRegistry expanded with Pyro, TFP, Whisper, CLIP, Vampire, E, Isabelle
- **C-III**: UEG schema extended for Bayesian parameters, blockchain receipts, multi-modal embeddings
- **C-IV**: Orchestrator now manages hypothesis generation, parallel proving, workflow composition
- **C-V**: Dashboard adds hypothesis explorer, blockchain status, personal assistant UI
- **C-VI**: Reasoning engine integrates hypothesis generator, multi-prover, Bayesian uncertainty
- **C-VII**: Application layer adds workflow composer, personal assistant, multi-modal browser
- **C-VIII**: Governance audits now cover hypothesis integrity, proof validity, blockchain compliance

## 📦 Implementation Blueprint Summary

The phased implementation now includes **10 new module groups** with ~60 critical new files:
```
agentic-core/
├── hypothesis/          # AI hypothesis generation & ranking

├── provenance/          # IPFS + Ethereum blockchain integration

- **AY**: Adaptive Model Selection
- **AZ**: Automatic Failover

Each article includes binding requirements, verification methods, and implementation directives.

## 🧠 Enhanced Eight-Layer Cognitive Kernel

All layers (C-I through C-VIII) have been updated to integrate the new capabilities while preserving the immutable meta-cognitive governance loop. Key updates include:
- **C-I**: Multi-cloud broker with automatic failover
- **C-II**: ToolRegistry expanded with Pyro, TFP, Whisper, CLIP, Vampire, E, Isabelle
- **C-III**: UEG schema extended for Bayesian parameters, blockchain receipts, multi-modal embeddings
- **C-IV**: Orchestrator now manages hypothesis generation, parallel proving, workflow composition
- **C-V**: Dashboard adds hypothesis explorer, blockchain status, personal assistant UI
- **C-VI**: Reasoning engine integrates hypothesis generator, multi-prover, Bayesian uncertainty
- **C-VII**: Application layer adds workflow composer, personal assistant, multi-modal browser
- **C-VIII**: Governance audits now cover hypothesis integrity, proof validity, blockchain compliance

## 📦 Implementation Blueprint Summary

The phased implementation now includes **10 new module groups** with ~60 critical new files:
```
agentic-core/
├── hypothesis/          # AI hypothesis generation & ranking
├── proof/               # Multi-prover integration & translation
├── uncertainty/         # Bayesian learning & active learning
├── provenance/          # IPFS + Ethereum blockchain integration
├── assistant/           # Personalized research assistant
├── collaboration/       # AI-assisted editing enhancements
├── evidence/            # Multi-modal embedding & retrieval
├── workflow/            # Visual composer & template library
├── orchestration/       # Model router & distributed executor
└── infrastructure/      # Cloud broker with failover logic
```

## 🔑 Core Enhancements in v47.0

| Capability | Purpose | Key Technologies |
|------------|---------|-----------------|
| **AI-Powered Hypothesis Generator** | Proposes novel, testable hypotheses from the UEG | DeepSeek-R1, OLMo, causal discovery |
| **Automated Theorem Proving** | Machine-checkable proofs for all claims | Vampire, E, Isabelle/HOL, Lean/Coq translation |
| **Bayesian Deep Learning** | Principled uncertainty quantification | Pyro, TensorFlow Probability, conformal calibration |
| **Blockchain Provenance** | Immutable, verifiable publication records | IPFS, Ethereum testnet (Sepolia), smart contracts |
| **Personalized Research Assistant** | Adaptive, context-aware user assistance | User modeling, RL-based recommendations |
| **AI-Assisted Collaborative Editing** | Intelligent co-writing with conflict prediction | StarCoder2, OLMo, UEG-grounded citations |
| **Multi-Modal Evidence Fusion** | Images, audio, video as first-class evidence | CLIP, DINOv2, Whisper, Video-LLaMA |
| **Scientific Workflow Composer** | Visual drag-and-drop experiment design | Pre-built templates, automatic parallelization |
| **Adaptive Model Router** | Efficient model selection & caching | Latency/accuracy/resource-aware routing |
| **Automatic Failover** | Multi-cloud resilience & distributed execution | Ray, Celery, cloud-agnostic broker |
